## ToolboxItem class

Class for an item in the toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ToolboxItem implements IToolboxItem 
```
**Implements:** [IToolboxItem](./blockly.itoolboxitem.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [canBeFocused()](./blockly.toolboxitem.canbefocused.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.canBeFocused. |

|  [getClickTarget()](./blockly.toolboxitem.getclicktarget.md) |  | Gets the HTML element that is clickable. The parent toolbox element receives clicks. The parent toolbox will add an ID to this element so it can pass the onClick event to the correct toolboxItem. |
|  [getDiv()](./blockly.toolboxitem.getdiv.md) |  | Gets the div for the toolbox item. |

|  [getId()](./blockly.toolboxitem.getid.md) |  | Gets a unique identifier for this toolbox item. |
|  [getParent()](./blockly.toolboxitem.getparent.md) |  | Gets the parent if the toolbox item is nested. |
|  [init()](./blockly.toolboxitem.init.md) |  | Initializes the toolbox item. This includes creating the DOM and updating the state of any items based on the info object. |
|  [isCollapsible()](./blockly.toolboxitem.iscollapsible.md) |  | Whether the toolbox item is collapsible. |
|  [isSelectable()](./blockly.toolboxitem.isselectable.md) |  | Whether the toolbox item is selectable. |
|  [onNodeBlur()](./blockly.toolboxitem.onnodeblur.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.onNodeBlur. |
|  [onNodeFocus()](./blockly.toolboxitem.onnodefocus.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.onNodeFocus. |
|  [setVisible\_(\_isVisible)](./blockly.toolboxitem.setvisible_.md) |  | Sets whether the category is visible or not. For a category to be visible its parent category must also be expanded. |
